TopicTitle: How to use camera in "ship" view

Articles.Content:
So I absolutely can't seem to move the camera around in ship view. Works fine in map view though. Is there some button or other setting I need to press? 

 

Seems like the issue is when I alt-tab out this messes up the camera.  And hitting "tab" for mouselook doesn't seem to do anything. 

Edited February 24, 2023 by harlikwin

I've had multiple issues with alt-tabbing so far. The solution, for now, seems to be "don't alt-tab".

You can try setting your game to borderless window instead of fullscreen, that might mitigate it.
